tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: If you paid attention to the first tutorial in the series on trading systems, you must know the answer to the above question!

paragraphs.text: In the second tutorial in the series, we came up with two similar hypotheses: one involves trading during uptrends and the second, in downtrends.
Those are two distinct ideas and should be treated as different strategies because they will handle similar logic, but not the same!
We'll focus in the Downtrend strategy first, because I feel it's the most promising one!
